website_summaries.verdict: This duster packs some serious power and lots of attachments for a great price while also solving some of the problems of other brands.
pros: Features 2 speed settings, 8 nozzle attachments, and a 10-foot power cord to make it easy to maneuver
Casing is made of a lightweight but durable ABS plastic

customer_reviews.title: Shoot your computer components, not dust.
customer_reviews.text: Pros- - Two blower strengths - No more canned air - Blows powerfully Cons- - Loud. Very loud. - The attachments are crappy and won't fully stay on. - Air intake is easily blocked. My main issue with this are the attachments and lack of attachment mechanicisms. It uses tension to hold the attachments on, however when the entire thing is vibrating due to the motor AND blowing strong hair, it causes the attachments to easily come off. On top of the attachments coming off, they will SHOOT OUT due to the powerful blower. In other words, keep your hands on the attachments or you risk spearing your computer or whatever you are dusting.
customer_reviews.author: Just Kate

customer_reviews.title: Poor replacement for can air
customer_reviews.text: This is a poor replacement for can air- even on low setting the airflow is way too strong! Tried to return and got message no returns on this item even though NO WHERE on the listing does it state that!! Not happy at all !! Very disappointing and this was an Amazon Choice item- really??
customer_reviews.author: Frank Miller

customer_reviews.title: This thing blows.
customer_reviews.text: Blows very hard. I've been running around blowing everything I can get my hands on..... Well, anyway, this thing is well built and works great. I will save a ton on canned air and this works much better.
customer_reviews.author: J W G

customer_reviews.title: I'll huff and I'll puff and I'll... Nah I'll just let the XPOWER Airrow Pro Multi-Use Duster blow your houses down.
customer_reviews.text: 2 settings. 6 attachments. 1 filter (on the bottom). One truly fantastic machine. Just remember to have 1) A solid grip and 2) an attachment, on the unit when you turn it on. One time while starting it, I didn't realize that I wasn't holding it securely and that there was no attachment on and it flew out of my hands and dropped. Absolutely nothing happened to the unit, but the dust in the area went for a loooong ride. (And it startled my dog). Well worth every penny and would buy it again if I needed to. (Just remember to clean the filter every two or three times using it. (I clean it each time).
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Beware: this item is classified as “non-returnable”
customer_reviews.text: Non returnable and mine was missing all the attachments rendering it useless.
customer_reviews.author: uriga

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a month.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great until it didn't. I used it a few times in May 2018 (the month I purchased it)... then boxed it up and put it in the closet. I just got it out and tried to use it again in July 2018. It sparked and popped and died. I can't return it now ... too late. VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive and attachments arent great.
customer_reviews.text: Half the time the attachments fly off as air current is too strong and they are mostly useless and there isnt a small one for real precise use. And it gets VERY VERY hot all around after maybe 1minute of use. Takes a while to settle down after using too. Fan sucking in air underneath can get clogged up and you should let it die down before setting down on anything, it doesnt automatically turn off, its like a jet engine or hairdryer, it takes time to shut off all the way. I used small screws to affix the main attachment thats the smallest circumference for precison airflow to the unit seems to work good enough for me now.
customer_reviews.author: Stiv Kovacic

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to clean out my computers and my old radiators (They were sealed shut by poor paint jobs) and it worked great! I hope it lasts a long time. Pros: - Environmental friendly (no chemicals or waste) - Extremely powerful - Cost effective Cons: - Nozzle can blow off and damage components. I knew this was a risk before using it, just make sure you have a good grip on the nozzle part when in use (I only do this when working near sensitive components). I also recommend not using it so close to electronics as it's powerful enough where you don't need to be close in order for the device to be effective
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: If this product got anywhere near the pressure of canned air I would have been happy, but this destroys canned air! Other than it being as loud as a full size vacuum cleaner, it definitely puts out enough volume and pressure even on the lowest setting to be a very effective duster. In fact, on my first attempt I blew my mouse and some items on my desktop onto the floor before I could get it shut off. I think I'll actually need to fabricate a diffuser when I just want to blow the dust off my desk and only use full power when I want to do a deeper clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dustine Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Stop wasting money on the can-o-air and just buy it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have found this earlier before I spent so much on those cans of air. It works great, I have tons of electronics that constantly need dusting, game consoles, music equipment, and my PC. The only con I have is with it is the skinny tube attachment w/brush, it fits snug and at 1st looks impossible to fit on the attachment, I had to take my time fitting the skinny tube into the other skinny tube. I ended up not using it but it does work just a pain to get fit. Still a 5/5 product.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for dusting electronics. It doesn’t really work very well.
customer_reviews.author: sspaceman

customer_reviews.title: All they claim and more...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would have to buy a new refrigerator because it would not stay cold. Tried adjusting the temp and that did not work. Used canned air to blow underneath and that helped some. Saw this and thought I would give it a try as the canned air does not last long. I cannot believe all the dust, dirt and dog hair that came away from the coils using the air from this blower. Also used to clear dog hair from under stove. Amazing product and would recommend to anyone. It does not get icy cold like the canned air does. Saved the cost of repair or new frig.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be a little cheaper, but it's worth it
customer_reviews.text: Since there aren't exactly many (at this time, literally one) alternatives in this relatively new field of gadgetry, it's difficult to avoid the price - and while I would like to see something like this priced in the 50 dollar range, it's still worth it if you can manage. I was not expecting the absolute savagery of this thing. It's violent. I accidentally exploded a dust bunny all over my desk and had to get the vacuum to clean up its remains. This thing is no joke! When you first pick it up you'll notice the heft of it, too. It's a solid, well-built little machine and I feel like it will last decades.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not a Precision Tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item like the most user for the simple economics of it; invest in this rather than paying for the air cans. I needed for electronics use, by which this falls short significantly. It's like a reverse vacuum cleaner, it blows but not blasts. I attempted to use as an indoor cleaner like some reviewers suggested here which wasn't very effective either. You have to use exclusively outdoor which is not very practical either for all cases. It also didn't have a return policy, which is an instant 2 star deduction for any item for me. Short story: if you have a precision or electronics use need, go for the can.
customer_reviews.author: Magnificient_Ottoman

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality on this is great, it's almost like the old Japanese plastic from the 90s. I can't believe this is any question as to the power of these thing. I bought it to clean a desktop computer tower, and it works great. When I used it I saw dust flying out of the computer. I bought this precisely as a long term investment to not have to buy canned air all the time, not that canned air ever worked for me anyway. This is actually manufactured by Intertek, so the quality is great as would be expected.
customer_reviews.author: mechanicalbeing

customer_reviews.title: Concentrated power with the extensions included
customer_reviews.text: Used to clean internals of electronics. Although not "quite" as effective as canned air, the reducers help add to and concentrate the pressure. Relief vents help avoid stressing the motor and keep the fittings from popping off. The variety of extensions for concentrating air motion is necessary and well thought out. Although canned air will still be a last resort go to, this will cover 95% of my needs. very satisfied. the very long AC cord helps with it's portability. I just don't see how a battery operated unit would be nearly as effective or powerful.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to order this because of the reviews of the plastic attachments not sitting properly or falling off in use. I've used this a few times now to dust my PC, fans, and other random items. It has worked flawlessly, the parts fit, and didn't fall off in use. I'm not sure how they could actually fall off since they fit so snug. User error perhaps? ;P Besides that, it works great. Much better than canned air. It blasted the dust out of my old vintage fans and did a great job cleaning out my desktop PC. I never have to buy canned air again.
customer_reviews.author: David Deloria

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with how powerful this blower is. I wasn't sure if it was going to be as powerful as canned air but it is (and probably stronger)! This is a much better solution for me than canned air because I somehow always get liquid to come out of the canned stuff and waste it but with this blower I don't have to worry about that!
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: I should've bought this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Man, so much money down the drain buying canned air for my PC's. I have 2, and live in a fairly dusty area and had to blow them out regularly. This thing is fantastic. Got dust out of some places in my PC's that I didn't know were dusty. I also used it to clean out some window fans, the filter on our Dyson vacuum and a few other things. Such a great purxhase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely garbage
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok the first two times. The third time I plugged it and it worked as normal for a few seconds and then it started to power down and a weird smell (like burning plastic or computer components) was coming from it so I turned it off. I wasn't even using it for 30 seconds before this happened. Now it refuses to turn on, to no surprise, so I have a completely useless product. For 50 bucks I expected something that would last me more than 2 uses. What a piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Orr

customer_reviews.title: Goes fwoo not fp fp fp
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a few months now, it goes fwoo not fp fp fp like I'd expect from canned air, if you're expecting fp fp fp you'll be disappointed, however the fwoo is really strong and leaves no residue which matters to me and my regular various electronics dusting. Also it has a bunch of, dare I say, superfwoous brush attachments to make the fwoo different. Overall excellent value for what I need it for; replacing repetitive fp fp fp purchasing with one lifetime fwoo commitment. Fwooive out of fwooive!
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely powerful
customer_reviews.text: I was using the compressed air canisters for the longest time, but now that have this air blower the compressed air lasts way longer. I don't think this is a total substitute for using compressed air. It's too powerful to be used on sensitive electronic equipment, but if you have power tools and large electrical appliances that need dust removal, this is the tool to use. The variety of blower attachments is really good also. I recommend this if you're looking for a powerful portable air blower. And no, it won't replace your leaf blower.
customer_reviews.author: JasonV

customer_reviews.title: This will save me much time and money!
customer_reviews.text: I got sick of buying compressed air that never seemed to really dust. I bought this to see how I liked it, and this little machine is awesome! Seems to pack a powerful punch. I’ve only used it for dusting items (a fan, a lamp shade, and a hanging lamp that I can’t remove). I can’t wait to use this on my other lamp shades and fans! I take the items outside (except the hanging lamp) since they are quite dusty. But this air compressor is really great. Lightweight too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Very good performance and portability.
customer_reviews.text: I like this blower it's very compact and has a good airflow output, for the price it has no competition. I also own another duster from a different brand that's almost double the price of this one,and to be honest that one has a stronger airflow output, but I prefer this one for it's size and portability, normally i clean pcs and other electronics with these, and I have no complain about this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: A handy easy to use tool
customer_reviews.text: I really like this unit. It is useful for many things. I purchased it to blow out my computer and keyboard but we also have a dog that likes to shed on everything and this is a great asset for Hair & dust and cleaning in tight quarters like a computer. A heck of a lot less expensive than all those compressed air cans I used to buy. Comes with a whole set of tools to expand the things you can do with it. Also, has multiple speeds so you can use less air where needed.
customer_reviews.author: LTB

customer_reviews.title: Dont think just buy lol
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these for ages. It is not that loud. And it does blow with plenty of power to clean out a system. I would say a bit more than a can of compressed air does. I ordered green but got a black one. Was a bit bummed but it is ok. I have used it lots of times. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: JTBivens

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: We're blown away by this thing, almost literally. If you're going to blow out a computer that's been sitting around for a couple of years, be sure to take it outside first, otherwise you'll have dust everywhere. I deducted one star since the little brush attachment thing didn't fit correctly, but it's not a big deal and we don't use that anyway. If you just want to keep keyboards and computers and the like dust-free, this will do it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I chose this air pump blower due to the reviews. I was not disappointed! I initially purchased it to clean home computers but have found many other uses. We use it daily to clean our robot vacuum cleaner, blows all the dust right out and keeps the filter clean as well. Also, when sanding my kitchen cabinet drawers, I used it to blow off the sanding dust. Also, blowing off leaves from our deck and even blowing dust off of artificial flower arrangements. You'll find many uses for this great item!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: One can of Air Spray is Not enough
customer_reviews.text: A great buy for us. Very versatile especially with the different attachments. Comes with a durable carry bag. We used it on our foodline refrigeration units that had not been thoroughly cleaned in years and had an immense about of dust in its coil; foodline units both running smoothly and cooling at a lower temp than previously. Smaller attachments worked well on the various size air filters in the ice machine and food toaster. No more Air Spray cans for us.
customer_reviews.author: VGLTech

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: So powerful! It is basically a reverse vacuum cleaner. I bought this for the crumbs that constantly build up on my Macbook Pro, and it did the job in about 5 seconds. I then tried it on the little bits that always seem to end up in my bed, and it got rid of them too. I imagine this would work for any surface that you wouldn't want to vacuum, but don't use this on light fragile items as the strength would likely knock them over and break them. I was wary about spending so much money on something to clean my computer, but I can see that this would save me lots of money on air cans.
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: Dust off. Way off!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as descibe. This bad boy kicks. Be sure to clear anything around the area in use. This thing will blow out anything in its direction. Perfect for blowing out dust off of computer components. Just be sure to angle the components and/or computer case your dusting downward and away. Use it in increments as the air can get warm in continual use. Last, be sure to plug into a bare socket and not plugged into a power strip with other electronics plugged in. This thing uses a good amount of electricity.
customer_reviews.author: v-54

customer_reviews.title: This thing blows!
customer_reviews.text: I am speechless, but in a good way. The description doesn't do this thing justice, it should be described as an industrial electric turbo, the power cord had gotta be 8 gauge and for good reason, when this baby cranks up it makes the lights in the house dim. You will need a firm grip otherwise you'll be knocked over like a cherry firefighter at academy. You can feel this thing torque when you turn it on, wow, it's a lot of horse power for sure. The attachments and included carry bag make this a good deal, you can blow anything you want, although I don't recommend blowing animals, you don't want to launch your cat across the street.
customer_reviews.author: Big B

customer_reviews.title: Great Blower, Powerful unit
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a little high priced for some but I really like it! The blower is a good, solid quality! Nice fit in the hand, powerful blower with good assortment of tips. Great for inside computer cases, under keyboards, modems, monitors, hobbyists, old radios, TV’s, automotive, household cleanups, tight areas to get at. Great force of powerful air. 2 speeds, 120vac, changeable, washable filter on the bottom of the unit, probably 6 ft cord. Descent Blower!
customer_reviews.author: SpikeO

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, good value, replaces canned air for computer cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I was debating getting this instead of canned air since canned air is already pretty expensive. I'm glad I did. No restrictions using upside down and the power is very impressive... Much stronger than the canned air. The only complaint really is the size. It may have been better if it came with a rubber extension tube to reach more intricate places in PC cases but it's really not a massive deal since it's powerful enough to remove dust at quite a distance.
customer_reviews.author: superdimitri

customer_reviews.title: I use this for everything
customer_reviews.text: This works great, I use it for everything. I clean the spongy filter on the bottom regularly and it has given me no trouble. I use it for the pc's in my house, my AC, my air purifiers, I even use it for my dragon figures. I just hold them tight then blow them off. I use it for all kinds of dusting. It is a bit loud but worth it considering not only the cost of canned air but the waste in materials you throw away with each one of those canned airs... This thing has saved me about $300 so far and it is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Evangiline Melanson

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Good product for now. Hope it runs for months and years. 1. Two air speeds available. Each is pretty strong! I would say stronger than standard compressed air bottles. 2. Multiple colors to choose from: Green, Blue, Black,... 3. Multiple nozzle attachments: very useful for focused cleaning, with-brush cleaning, wide sweep, etc. Some attachments are difficult to figure out easily. 4. Does not look bad on counter table as it oddly looks like a kettle/ pot 5. Noise can be high: like a vacuum cleaner. Using it regularly now for business. I hope to post an update after some use.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Loud and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this for office dusting as it blows things EVERYWHERE! I used it 1 time and ended up picking up papers blown all over my office. The time you take weighting loose things down you may as well buy the canned air and use it quickly and be done without the clean up. Sending it back 1 day after purchasing this item also the connectors have holes where more air blows out making matters worse.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without this thing now
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the XPOWER A-2 a few months back based off of a recommendation from one of my friends. I bought a really nice mechanical keyboard which collects dust constantly. Using this XPOWER A-2 works almost too well because I find my self dusting other things once I start. It's a great tool to have if you have a lot of electronics which tend to collect dust. I recommend bringing the electronics outside if really dusty since this thing tends to stir up a lot of dust when in use. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Good lord this thing blows. Literally.
customer_reviews.text: DAMN. This thing beats canned air six ways from sunday. ENORMOUS airflow, but not pinpoint like a compressor duster, so it just shoves all the dust out without worry of it damaging electronic components. It's not very small, but it gets where it needs to, and makes dusting a trivial matter. It's loud, but it moves a buttload of air. Very solid, industrial feeling quality, too. Sad I didn't buy this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Colin S. MartinTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Much stronger and more effective than canned air. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: The XPOWER A-2 Electric Computer Duster Dryer Air Pump Blower is great. The different nozzles that come with it make it easy to clean almost any crevice or tight spot. It blew out more junk and dust from my electronic equipment and computers and keyboards than than any can of compressed air cever did. The money I saved by not having to buy any more cans of compressed air paid for the XPower. I would not let children play with this. The air pressure is very strong, and could damage ears or eyes of kids or pets. The only drawback is the noise. This machine is very loud. I wear noise cancelling headphones when using the XPower.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: As I was deep cleaning my house, I ran out of my "Can of Air" that I use to dust all of my electronics. Well after pricing bundles of more "Can of Air" I realized it was expensive. So I looked with other options and found this. Figured I'd give it a try, and I am so happy that I did. Not only can I use this to dust my electronics, I can also use it to dry my dogs after their baths!! And it won't run out of air!! Win win.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It has two speeds, a strong flow of air ...
customer_reviews.text: It has two speeds, a strong flow of air and a stronger flow of air. I purchased this item, to blow out the dust that collects in my desktop PC and keyboards. I used to use my AirForce Master Blaster air dryer, which is bulky and the hose attachment nozzle too large to fit in some places of the computer. Using canned air, you need to be aware of not turning the can upside down, which can discharge liquid water due to the properties of canned air, plus you are continuing to re-order. This item came with a carrying bag, which holds all of the different attachment nozzles, very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Satisfyingly Cleaned Everything
customer_reviews.text: It cleaned out my 2017 gaming computer very well! I had to be meticulous about what I was doing, but i daresay it was fun in doing so! Maintaining your computer is a very important thing to do, especially if you have a lot of dust covers, and radiators for your IO or Cooling systems. And this blower fan is tremendously strong. I would recommend it to everyone that doesn't want to spend any more money on canned air. Drawback is it is super loud! I don't mind the noise knowing I'll have a better, smoother running pc!
customer_reviews.author: Smutty

customer_reviews.title: confusing at first kind of and weird but love it
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow this thing is so strong... like unbelievably powerful. This is probably one of the best things I have purchased on AMAZON for my PC. No more of that air can crap that you constantly have to buy. When I say this is strong I mean it. The nozzles are kind of weird because some of them have holes on the sides? but I just use the ones that don't have any holes at all. I use it to clean my desk and keyboard. BEST PURCHASE EVER
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Phan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just didn't get the color shown!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace weak, expensive cans of air with something that actually has more power and reuse. This definitely does it for sure! Powerful, has a nice long cable, and multiple heads to help get different powers, shapes of air, etc.. The one bad thing that happened was, I ordered the green one as shown on the picture, but got a solid black one. I specifically ordered the green one for preference, so this is why my overall rating is 2 and not 4+
customer_reviews.author: Eric Renfro

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cleaning Computers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a mobile onsite computer I.T. business that I own. I needed a way to blow the dust out of desktop computers. I tried using a small compressor but it was too bulky and loud. I bought this blower and it works great! Even the low setting was enough to blow the dust out of the CPU cooler and fans. Another review said it was too loud but I actually expected it to be much louder. I think it is a decent noise level that you would expect. I will definitely be keeping this with my other tools that I carry for computer repairs.
customer_reviews.author: AaronM

customer_reviews.title: Nice long power cable
customer_reviews.text: Nice long power cable. Used it to clean some old fans and heatsinks of tobacco residue (which is much tougher to remove than any sort of ordinary dust), and it answered nicely. If anything it's overpowered. Haven't had any problems with attachments slipping-off. Also haven't noticed any significant overheating, though I used it for short stretches over a 30 min period. If you need to clean 50 computers all-day every day, you should probably look-into a serious air compressor and add a condensation-trap in-line abaft the nozzle. For most technicians this should work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean filter
customer_reviews.text: More powerful than canned air. Easy to clean filter. A variety of nozzles. This is the best solution out there if you are having to use canned air more than once per year for your electronics. We routinely clean our computer systems, monitors, keyboards, TV's, Game console, Stereo and other items every month. This is also great for blowing the dust off of fidge coils, and anything else you can think of where you might want to use canned air. Compared to the cost of the canned air this unit will save you money in the course of a year and do a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: shinshidoshi

customer_reviews.title: Strong motor and quality- however the nozzle is not as funneled.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to keep purchasing one time air compressor cans so I decided to pull the trigger on one of these. Unfortunately these do not completely replace the air compressor cans. The nozzle is much wider and it is not the same. For general blowing and cleaning it will work fine but if you are looking for air in a small or specific area, I would recommend air compressor cans.
customer_reviews.author: John Wong

customer_reviews.title: Xpower A-2 Arrow duster
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, good and bad I decided the bad wasn't enough to keep me from buying it. It's big, but not bulky. Its loud, but it's also moving a ton of air. The conical reducer and the straw extender do fit, albeit really snug. Very long cord, which was nice. Comes with a bag for storage. Theres two settings: high (forward) > off (middle) > low (back). Would recommend, and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Scuba_Steve

customer_reviews.title: NO more canned air
customer_reviews.text: I have used several different brands of canned air for PC/laptop builds and repairs. Realized I was out and decided to order the XPOWER A-2 Airrow Pro and it was a great idea. I have used it to clean PC and laptop fans, motherboards, and cases. It's one of those purchases that you wonder why it took you so long. Highly recommend it for dust and moisture removal, easy to setup and use. Say goodbye to canned air - this should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: SRW53

customer_reviews.title: Why did I not buy this sooner ?
customer_reviews.text: Blows so hard! Best blow job ever...... blowing dust off my motherboard and gpu. A must have for any computer tech or owner. You won’t regret it. Lots of nice attachments too. Has helped me clean up my PC efficiently with or nasty air shooting out moisture. This is way better than canned air can ever be.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah & Corey

customer_reviews.title: No more spray cans!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I don't have to use those dumb cans anymore. Those dumb compressed cans are so lame. This thing is so easy you plug it in and then blow and the dust come right off. I had a large home improvement that put dust on everything. I was able to dust everything with this, the electronics yes, the computer yes, but also other things as well. The price is worth it. You could spend a fortune in cans or you can buy this and never have to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: tbone1982

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good value, the attachments kinda aren't the best though.
customer_reviews.text: I wrote 1 stars for "Drying Power" because this isn't supposed to dry, it blows air. I've owned another or the same before, but now the attachments are not nearly as good, they tend to fly off the blower itself--which does work very well and as long as you kind of hold onto the attachment, is very effective. Overall I like it. Saves lots of money over buying cans of blower.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT GOODGAME

customer_reviews.title: This is a mini leaf blower...
customer_reviews.text: This came up as I was looking to buy some duster cans for cleaning electronics. It seemed like a good, reusable alternative to the duster cans. The air coming out of this thing is pretty strong, but doesn’t have the same pin point pressure that duster cans can give you to clean tight spots. For my specific use, it isn’t really practical to pull this whole thing out, plug it in for a 3 second burst of air and then have to pack the entire thing away. Also about as loud as a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: JKden03

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, as it does what a typical "Can Electronic Duster" many times over. This product will live its use many times over the price. To include not having to wait for the Can air duster to warm up after continuous use. I have had this Item since Oct 11th 2018 and it is still working. I have mainly used to to clean Laptop's, PC Towers, Keyboards, iMacs. I do not have anything negative to say about it personally. It just does the jump just as simple as I could put.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Garcia

customer_reviews.title: This blows!
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job dusting my computer. Attachments good for getting into nooks, or brushing stubborn cat fur from radiators and heat sinks. Cats hate how loud it is. A boon when you want to clean your computer without cats exploring it.
customer_reviews.author: Yui Daoren

customer_reviews.title: Way better than canned air.
customer_reviews.text: Even if you find canned air more powerful than this product, what do you do when the air runs out? I use this to clean my computers, clean my keyboard, remove cat hair from, well from everywhere. Slightly noisy but this is expected for such a powerful device. It's pretty much the same size (slightly bigger) than a can of air, but the nozzle helps to reach hard to reach areas. The only downfall is that you have to have the cord attached where-ever you go. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Expert_Review

customer_reviews.title: Great canned air replacement
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding blower. Stronger than a can of air and does a fabulous job blowing out desktops and laptops. I go through a good amount of canned air and wanted a greener solution. This does a better job blowing out computers and does it in a shorter amount of time. The added force does a better job cleaning out dust balls in electronics than any canned air I have used. My PCs are now cleaner than they've been since they were built. I haven't tried blowing up an air mattress with it yet but have no doubt it will do a great job on it.
customer_reviews.author: david laufnick

customer_reviews.title: Developers need to make attachments with twist and lock design for safety!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This has plenty of power and puts out a strong blast of air. Good for cleaning the inside of my computer or anywhere you need debris moved. Cons: the attachments should have a twist and lock built into the nozzle! I am very wary of putting a push on attachment that might blow off and hit a delicate component on my computer or something else. (like me for instance). Remember, this is a strong blower. Even so, it will find many uses in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Jack G. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Powerful air blaster
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the tool you need if you're tired of spending money on canned air. It has two speeds and even the slower speed produces lots of air. It features a foam filter on the bottom that can easily be cleaned. You won't have to worry about buying those expensive cans that run out of air quickly. Please note that the unit will get warm after operating on high-speed for a short while.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blows the competition away
customer_reviews.text: I'll never buy canned air again. Seriously. This thing is a lifesaver. I have a full tower case, and it eats up canned air when I do my weekly blowout, and now I'm never have to prove I'm old enough and responsible enough to own canned air (seriously, they ID you for it lmao), and this is roughly the cost of an 8 pack, so I'll be saving money in about 2 months. This thing is powerful and gets it done, quick.
customer_reviews.author: Warner

customer_reviews.title: I think this will work!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure we've spent hundreds of dollars on canned compressed air. This little gem is high powered with a low and high setting. Works great. I was really kind of hoping for dual-use, vacuum and blower. Nonetheless, I am happy despite the condition of the "used" condition when purchased. The box was pretty beat up and the bag for the attachments is missing.
customer_reviews.author: Neslo Ventures

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece of hardware. If it continues to perform the way it did day 1, than my review shouldn't change. I've only had it for a week, but it's been so helpful in removing dust from my desk and from inside my computer case (no more canned air). The attachments are also helpful but the straw attachment doesn't really fit on anything which is funny (I really tried to force it on). Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: It Blows!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that this blower just wouldn't be all that powerful. Let me tell you, it Blows! Hard! Real Hard! I wasn't expecting the torque of the motor to be so strong. It will jerk in your hand when you start it. Of course as you attach the various nozzles on it the air flow volume goes down but the pressure remains very high. No need to worry about the can type cooling off and losing pressure with this blower.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: It has a lot of power. Personally it has more than enough power to clean a computer very well. I was using a air compressor before instead of canned air and this has more power than that did. I would just be careful with your computer fans when blowing the dust out. Over all does more than what I wanted to do and am pleased with the purchase. Canned air is usually not nearly powerful enough to get out the dust and costs way too much money. This will last me a long time I’m sure unless it breaks and be much more cost effective and less time consuming considering how fast the dust gets blown out.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: wow this thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of paying for compressed air cans. And the cheap cans are junk. Just wasted money. But you don't have to plug in compressed air cans. As long as you don't mind dragging a cord around with you (and cleaning the filter), this thing really blows. Most of the time I just use the standard tool, and on the low setting. Yeah, it's noisy, but that's to be expected. It's basically a portable leaf-blower. Make sure to keep an eye on the filter, this thing really moves a lot of air, and if it sucks in a lot of dust.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kosloske

customer_reviews.title: Pays for itself!!
customer_reviews.text: I run a computer sales/repair shop, and have spent tons on "canned air". I stopped buying and selling it when the kids started "huffing" it. So have been dragging out the big air compressor and cleaning out machines, etc. with that, having to be so careful about static. This little unit is the perfect solution! 2 speeds depending on what the job is, easy to handle, and great attachments!! My life just got a bit easier...
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: will save u money on constantly buying canned air
customer_reviews.text: cleaned pc and keyboard. although it is very powerful its not very forceful to components meaning i still had to wipe them down with a damp rag to get all the junk out n make it look like new. it is very loud when used indoors, the cord could b long. only thing i didnt like. attachments r nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Nice lil leafblower
customer_reviews.text: Hearty lil blower, blew out a PC in no time, was a little disappointed in the air intake, its covered with some soft foamy fabric that got dusty/dirty very fast when unit was set down, partly my fault as I didn't know about it until I was putting it away after use. Overall satisfied and would recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandman

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase EVER
customer_reviews.text: I went looking for canned air and then ran across this XPOWER blower. It showed up in two days and I just used it on my extremely dusty custom machine. My machine is now clean as a whistle and my fans are all running a lot slower and quieter again, like they're supposed to. I'm pretty happy because I can now clean my computer the right way without having to lug it down to the shop and use their compressor to blow it out. Would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: dirtstyle

customer_reviews.title: Be sure not to set it down on a soft surface like a carpet
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as forceful as canned air, but still does the job well. Be sure not to set it down on a soft surface like a carpet, or resting on your flannel shirt as the air intake is on the bottom. You can actually run the intake side across the vents over your PC fans to suck the dust out if they're screened off and dust gets trapped there, but you'll want to clean the filter shortly thereafter.
customer_reviews.author: George Hess

customer_reviews.title: No More Canned Air
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 computers in my house. I also am tech support for all my friends and family so needless to say I have to dust a lot of computers. I have always bought the store bought canned air because I just assumed it was the best way to go. After getting frustrated over the cost versus how long a can lasts me, I decided to see what else was available. the XPOWER was well rated so I decided to give it a shot. This works perfectly. I'm only sorry that I didn't get one earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Dack Man

customer_reviews.title: It's like a mini leaf blower cannon for the house
customer_reviews.text: It's like a mini leaf blower cannon for the house. Blow the dog hair around the floor with one hand, and receive them in the other hand with the vacuum cleaner, Ghostbusters style. The particles inside the keyboard groves fly out so hard, that the keys wants to go out flying too. Some times I use this to dry excess water on cast iron skillets before they go in the oven. It doesn't filter tiny particles, so don't use this to dry your eye glasses | >_> |
customer_reviews.author: Cool Story

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a little over 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this and a little over 30 days later (with only a little use) something has broken loose inside. It’s beyound the return period and I guess I’m just out. I’ll have to take it apart and see if it can be fixed. I took it apart and the top of the motor has a plastic bushing holding its rotor in place. This is melted and the plastic frame that holds it in place is broken loose. I didn’t run this long enough at a time to have melted this bearing. Never more than a few seconds at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Corn

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet POWERFUL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What generally takes me hours each month to clean my computers and electronics took just minutes. I was surprised how long the cord was and the power this little guy has. My only suggestion is that use it in bursts and let it sit due to it getting warm after a few minutes. The plus is all the extra attachment that the XPOWER A-2 Airrow Pro has. Plus it came with a bag that looks like my wife may take lol....
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Works great, fair price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use mainly as a duster for computer and other electronics. It puts out an amazing amount of air and has high and low settings. It has a variety of nozzles for different applications. After looking at several different products I'm very happy with this one. It is a very handy tool for around the house. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: kapnbill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome investment
customer_reviews.text: Great investment. Saves you time from making trips to the store or waiting for canned air to ship. Saves you money since you don’t need to but air cans anymore. Its stronger than any air can I’ve used. I’m able to blow out of areas since I don’t have to worry about the can freezing up or going empty. I have no regrets on picking this over the hurricane or the x500d.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous_

customer_reviews.title: Talk about a no-brainer!!! (especially for PC gamers)
customer_reviews.text: I could kick myself for the hundreds of dollars I threw out on canned air. THIS HERE IS THE REAL DEAL! It has two speeds: (I) tornado and (II) monsoon. Speed 1 is powerful, Speed 2 will pull paint of your rig. The container wasn't the best looking thing, but the device seemed new enough. I did some research on other dusters but for this price point, I give this *two* thumbs up. There are tons of videos on YouTube that will give you an example of its power as well
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: LOUD! Works like a champ though.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is handy, but its LOUD. Like so loud I bet you didn't know something the size of a half gallon of milk could make that much noise. Works like a champ though. I think including a small, cheap nylon drawstring or zipper bag with it would be nice for carrying the unit and all the attachments around in. You don't always know what the next clients computer or server room is going to look like when you show up and it's not convenient to tote all the different tips around with the unit..
customer_reviews.author: TactMoneyTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Powerful small unit.
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect instead of buying Dust Off in the can, only issue is you have to be careful it's very powerful and will blow small objects of your shelve and if it hits paper it to will be all over the place. So just be mindful and watch but works great for those hard to get places.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: You'll never look back.
customer_reviews.text: Instantly love it. The fittings are a little rough and it's loud. Other than that I love this thing. I live in dusty So-Cal and used to go through a can of air a month. Not any more! Also this eliminated the risk of liquids hitting my valuable electronics. I recommend this item if you have a computer or other electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Young

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It definitely has good power. I used to have one just like this but it was metal, kind of wish this one had a metal case too. I also wish the cord plug had a notch on it for holding the cord wrapped around the unit like my old one used to have. But it does come with a storage bag, so there's that at least.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean out the dust in my computer. it does this a little too well. My wife yelled at me to creating a big cloud of dust in the living room. It is a good idea to keep the fans from spinning when cleaning out electronics. I decided to get this instead of cans of dry air because cans of dry air is typically a fast decaying refrigerant. not just compressed air, so i am a little more comfortable with it on an environmental perspective.
customer_reviews.author: Gregs

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: This product provides a very powerful sream of air. I was able to easily clean out my computers and ps4s. It's so powerful that its best to have someone hold any loose parts on the item being cleaned (such as fans). The only improvement would be improving the attachment mounting to be more than just friction. I hold the attachment when using just in case.
customer_reviews.author: GlennK

customer_reviews.title: Save money on canned air!
customer_reviews.text: You will never go back to canned air again once you use this unit. Great for blowing out dust accumulation from your computer. With the attachments that come with it, it really is a multi use blower and well worth the money. It even comes with a handy bag to store it in. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: robert campbell

customer_reviews.title: Way more effective than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well. Maybe too well. First time using it, pointed it into my computer, powered it into low power mode... and it shot the dust out of my PC and all over my room through the sheer amount of power this thing spit out. It can also push light objects from across the room. I'd say it's about 10x more force than a standard can of compressed air... so it definitely gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S. Giovannini

customer_reviews.title: Eliminate the waste of disposable cannisters
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! PROS: >It cleans better than the disposable air canisters. >Its built well >Easy to use CONS: >You have to be a little careful when using it; its got a lot of power (the included tips help control it).
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: This little guy rocks! I had gone to Amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: This little guy rocks! I had gone to Amazon intending to buy a case of canned air so that I could keep my computers free from all of the dust that is associated with desert living and I ran into an ad for this little unit and decided to give it a try. Well, the people who left reviews that said you would never need to buy another can of air again were right - This little guy rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Online Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: The attachments are crappy. They do not fit correctly and as some other reviewers noted they can come flying off at random moments. None of the attachments are small enough/narrow enough to do a decent job of cleaning a keyboard. I don’t know how this is a choice Amazon item
customer_reviews.author: A.L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Blower
customer_reviews.text: Bought to clean dust out of computers, has 2 setting high and low and comes with a variety of attachments. The blower itself is so strong i run it on low with no funneling nozzle and it has more power than traditional canned air with tip. If the price isn't the issue and you're looking for quality and power, this will be perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, has good airflow.
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well, and has pretty good aiflow. Good enough for garage blow-out, of random dirt & dust. All air input is through the bottom so it needs to have bottom uncovered, during use. If just sitting, it tends to choke, and get hot, so we put it on a riser, and/or you can just lay it on its side, if suitable to your blowing setup. Works well to air-dry convoluted objects, or inside endine compartments. Also used it to blow out computer chassis, without worrying about over-cooling the chips & internal parts.
customer_reviews.author: esdguru08

customer_reviews.title: it blasts, truly
customer_reviews.text: i didn't clean my computer for 4 years and decided it was high time to end this grossness i bought this air blower thing and made quick work of all the accumulated dust bunnies ADVISORY: Dust your computer components off in a super well ventilated area or outside cause dust particles got everywhere due to how effective this thing is
customer_reviews.author: MEL

customer_reviews.title: This does a great job and i don't need to buy cans of ...
customer_reviews.text: i was worried this wouldn't be able to put out the air pressure that a new can could. it is slightly less power than a new can of air but I'd say its probably equivalent to a 3/4 full can of air. This does a great job and i don't need to buy cans of air anymore.
customer_reviews.author: GHK

customer_reviews.title: This thing is powerful. I bought the competing Data-Vac ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is powerful. I bought the competing Data-Vac for my sister, and this one is at least as powerful. The only difference is that the XPower has a rocker switch to go from high, low and off, while the Data-Vac has no switch at all (it just goes when you plug it in). I use it to clean my computers, my desk, the vents in my house and the dashboard on our cars. So much easier than dusting by hand.
customer_reviews.author: StudioVRM

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cleaning Air Cleaner and HEPA Filters
customer_reviews.text: This air compressor does an excellent job on my Blueair air cleaner and Honeywell HEPA air cleaners. Filters for air cleaners are very expensive so this is an effective alternative to blow out dust from the unit as well as the HEPA filters. Take unit outside and see how much dust can be blown out with this air compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent R

customer_reviews.title: Great Powerful Blower!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome blower, exactly what I wanted. I didn’t want the hassle of a pancake compressor, and I didn’t want to continually buy cans of compressed air. I use it to blow dry metal parts that I recently cleaned, and it’s perfect. It puts out a lot of air, and it’s easy to use. I mainly use the straw like attachment, connected with the funnel like adapter. I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: ChapHaus

customer_reviews.title: V12 engines in little bodies
customer_reviews.text: holy ****, this thing has some serious power behind it! it jolted in my hand the first time i turned it one because i wasnt expecting that kind of power. the only thing i will say is i had to cut the straw mod into a tapered end because it wouldnt fit, thats the only reason its not getting a 5 star review, everything else is great. who needs canned air anymore? youll spend a fortune on it throughout your life and its not even as good as this duster, im never going back to canned air
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great air blower
customer_reviews.text: The product pictured is green so I was happily surprised when it was actually black. I have a thing against green, haha. Has lots of attachments, although I had hoped that the "straw" attachment would have been much thinner to better direct airflow but no biggie. Airflow is very strong - I've only used it on the low setting so far, to clean electronics. Plan to also use this to clean cellular window shades. Happy to not buy disposable air canisters. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoShopper

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little thing
customer_reviews.text: Green version. This thing has some power! Two modes and I was shocked by the first mode because it was powerful, it twists when turning on. Very pleased! It’s a great addition to the garage and hopefully take it with on some racing days or bashing days.
customer_reviews.author: Luke R

product_meta.title: XPOWER A-2 Airrow Pro Multi-Use Electric Computer Duster Dryer Air Pump Blower - Blue
product_meta.description: Size:A-2| Color:BlueThe XPOWER A-2 Airrow Pro Multi-use Electric Duster Blower is a lightweight, compact and incredibly powerful air blower that includes easy-to-use 9 air flow nozzles for endless applications. More than just a replacement for canned air dusters, the XPOWER Airrow Pro provides you the power and flexibility to dust, pump air, and dry. Unleash over 500 watts of power, XPOWER A-2 is designed for frequent and heavy-duty corporate, IT, home and office usages. XPOWER A-2 is an inexpensive and permanent alternative to canned air dusters. By using the A-2 Airrow Pro, you will feel confident about not only eliminating the cost of canned air dusters, but freeing your home or office of toxic inhalants as well. Powered only by electricity, the Airrow Pro is completely free of dangerous fluorocarbons and other deadly propellants. For U.S. or countries with 120V/60Hz power standards. With just one A-2 Airrow Pro Handheld Electric Duster, you will never need to buy another can of air again!
feature_bullets: MULTI-USE- Dust & clean computers, laptops, car interiors, cameras, medical equipment, model vehicles, and blinds. Dry wet surface and hard-to-reach places. Inflate airbeds, small inflatables and floats.
POWERFUL, ENERGY EFFICIENT AND LIGHTWEIGHT- (For 120V/60Hz power systems ONLY) 3/4 HP motor with 500 watts, 90 CFM airflow, and only weighs 2.3 pounds.
DURABLE AND SAFE- ABS rugged plastic housing with long 10' cord, thermal protection, ETL/CETL Safety Certified & ONE YEAR limited Continental US warranty.
CONVENIENT FEATURES- Built-in 2-speed control, easy to change washable filter, and 10 feet durable cord that can be nicely wrapped around the unit for easy storage.

SAVE MONEY & THE ENVIRONMENT- inexpensive and nontoxic. Unlike canned air dusters, the XPOWER A-2 Airrow PRO doesn't contain any of fluorocarbons or dangerous inhalants/propellants. This is a onetime investment so you will never need to buy canned air ever again!
